How many times item A and B were purchas: How many times item A and B were purchased in the same order
Total number of orders with product A in: Total number of orders with product A in them, during specified timeframe
Total number of orders with product B in: Total number of orders with product B in them, during specified timeframe
How frequently orders include product A: How frequently orders include product A as a percent of total orders
How frequently orders include product B: How frequently orders include product B as a percent of total orders
How frequently orders include both produ: How frequently orders include both product A and B as a percent of total orders
How many times both Products are purchas: How many times both Products are purchased when Product A is purchased
The likelihood that buying product A dro: The likelihood that buying product A drove the purchase of product B
The % of times product A is purchased al: The % of times product A is purchased alone, over all transactions containing product A
% of times product A is purchased by cus: % of times product A is purchased by customers who only bought product A in the timeframe
The % of times product A is purchased by: The % of times product A is purchased by a customer with a registered loyalty number
The % of times product B is purchased al: The % of times product B is purchased alone, over all transactions containing product B
% of times product B is purchased by cus: % of times product B is purchased by customers who only bought product B in the timeframe
The % of times product B is purchased by: The % of times product B is purchased by a customer with a registered loyalty number
The probability both items would be purc: The probability both items would be purchased together, should be considered in relation to total order count, the highest score being 1
